description: Probably originally a reduced form of over + all.

adjectives.description: orra (comparative more orra, superlative most orra)

entries.meaning: (now Scotland) Superfluous; odd, unmatched, left over.
(now Scotland) Of people: idle, unemployed, disreputable. [from 16th c.]
examples: But the bothy billies, the ploughmen and the orra men of the Mains, they'd never care for gentry except to mock at them  [â€¦]
